result.execSummary:
The defendant Curtis S. CANNON was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Curtis S. CANNON

records.addlTxt:
Petition and Order for Payment of Court-Appointed Counsel Fees signed by MRR on 05-03-2016.
Voucher 16-079, in the amount of $350.00, sent to the Manitowoc County Comptroller on 05-04-2016.  4 pages.
Copies of Petition and Order mailed to defendant and counsel on 05-04-2016.
The action has concluded on this case and the Court-appointed counsel is removed effective 05-03-2016.

records.descr: Order Collection Biological Specimen DNA Analysis

records.addlTxt: Payment Plan requested for monthly payment of $50.00; payment plan documents filed with case.

State files an Amended Information charging disorderly conduct, contrary to Section 947.01(1) of the Wisconsin Statutes.   Motion granted.   No contest plea to the amended charge.   Convicted.  Defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for fifteen (15) days, under the Huber Law, to commence on 02-29-16 at 5:00 p.m.   Defendant must submit DNA sample.  $443.00 court costs imposed, to be paid by 03-06-16 or 9 days jail.   
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights.   
Minutes.

Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with D.A. is set for 09-23-15 at 2:00 p.m.
Minutes.
Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Petition for Appointment of Counsel;  Affidavit of Indigency.  Order Appointing Attorney Eric Pangburn as counsel of record through Manitowoc County.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to counsel.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  Arraignment is set for 08-07-15 at 3:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $1,500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no assaultive contact with S.R.R., DOB: 04-30-1998.   Bail furnished.   
Minutes.

RE:  S.R.R., DOB: 04-30-1998, on 06-13-15.
Initial appearance is set for 07-27-15 at 2:30 p.m.
